mapper.select: SELECT sp.seatPriceId, bs.ticketId, u.userName, bs.ticketName, bs.ticketType, sp.status, sp.usedDt, bs.placeName, CONCAT(sp.seatZone, '존 ', sp.seatRow, '-', sp.seatCol) as seatFull FROM seatprice sp JOIN Users u ON sp.userId = u.userId JOIN book_show bs ON sp.ticketId = bs.ticketId WHERE 1=1 AND u.userId = #{userId} AND sp.ticketId = #{ticketId} AND sp.placeId = #{placeId}

SELECT ticketId , placeId , placeName , ticketName , description , ticketType , homeTeam , homeTeamLogo , awayTeam , awayTeamLogo , startDate , openDate FROM book_show WHERE 1=1 AND ticketType = 'sports' ORDER BY startDate, openDate

SELECT bs.ticketId, bs.ticketName, bs.startDate, bs.homeTeamLogo , p.placeId, p.placeName, p.address, p.seatZone, p.seatRow, p.seatCol, p.seatprice , COALESCE(sp.seatStatus, 'available') AS seatStatus FROM place p LEFT JOIN book_show bs ON bs.placeId = p.placeId LEFT JOIN seatprice sp ON sp.placeId = p.placeId AND sp.ticketId = bs.ticketId AND sp.seatZone = p.seatZone AND sp.seatRow = p.seatRow AND sp.seatCol = p.seatCol WHERE p.placeId = #{placeId} AND bs.ticketId = #{ticketId} ORDER BY p.seatZone+0, p.seatRow+0, p.seatCol+0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO seatprice(ticketId, userId, placeId, price, seatZone, seatRow, seatCol, usedDt, seatStatus) VALUES(#{ticketId}, #{userId}, #{placeId}, #{seatPrice}, #{seatZone}, #{seatRow}, #{seatCol}, #{usedDt}, 'booked');
mapper.select: SELECT ticketId , placeId , placeName , ticketName , description , ticketType , homeTeam , homeTeamLogo , awayTeam , awayTeamLogo , startDate , openDate FROM book_show WHERE 1=1 AND ticketType = 'Train' AND homeTeam = #{homeTeam} AND awayTeam = #{awayTeam} AND startDate = #{startDate} ORDER BY description
